comments:
Build used 12/12 WTP Integration. 

I get the following exception when trying to validate duplicate context roots in
an the application.xml of an EAR. Basically tried to add a duplicate context
root to a web project in application.xml and I got this exception.

i tried both j2ee1.3 and 1.4 projects with Jonas. Cannot reproduce it.
closing as it is not reproduceable
